industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Company Description

Founded in City of Industry, California in 2010, THUNDER INTERNATIONAL GROUP INC (TIG) is an international Cross-Border logistics company that provides E-Commerce Fulfillment, International Express Shipping, and Product Refurbishment services. With over 10 years of experience in the U.S. market and 6 fulfillment centers, TIG offers high-quality, high-efficiency, and comprehensive logistics solutions. Learn more at thunderex.com.

Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role as a Warehouse Supervisor. The Warehouse Supervisor will be responsible for overseeing day-to-day tasks such as supervising shipping and receiving operations, managing inventory control, ensuring material handling efficiency, and operating forklifts. The role is located in the Los Angeles Metropolitan Area.

Qualifications

  • Supervisory Skills
  • Experience in Shipping & Receiving and Inventory Control
  • Proficient in Material Handling
  • Knowledge and experience in Forklift Operation
  • Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities
  • Strong communication and leadership skills
  • Attention to detail and ability to multitask
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
  • Experience in logistics or warehouse management is a plus
  • Bachelor's degree in related field or equivalent experience

qualifications.required: Supervisory Skills, Experience in Shipping & Receiving and Inventory Control, Proficient in Material Handling, Knowledge and experience in Forklift Operation, Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities, Strong communication and leadership skills, Attention to detail and ability to multitask, Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, Experience in logistics or warehouse management is a plus, Bachelor's degree in related field or equivalent experience
